Writer: Ed Decter, John J. Strauss, Leo Benvenuti (characters), Steve Rudnick (characters)
Title: The Santa Clause 3: The Escape Clause
Actors: Tim Allen, Elizabeth Mitchell, Eric Lloyd, Judge Reinhold
Plot: Santa, aka Scott Calvin, is faced with double-duty: how to keep his new family happy, and how to stop Jack Frost from taking over Christmas.
